mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( m.parent_id, '--' ) parent_id, IFNULL( mm.menu_item_name, '--' ) parentName, IFNULL( mm.icon_name, '--' ) parentIconName, m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_item_name, m.icon_name, m.menu_url, m.menu_des FROM menu m LEFT JOIN menu mm ON m.parent_id = mm.menu_id ORDER BY parent_id
